  • Method Details

    • randomize

      public void randomize()

    • setButtons

      private void setButtons()
      Sets generated letters and solution letters to each input button. Additionally, adds EventHandlers to handle user input.

    • checkInput

      private void checkInput()
      As soon as the user has filled all input buttons, the input is checked whether their answer is right or wrong.

    • animateButtons

      private void animateButtons​(boolean isSolved)
      This method starts an animation and shows, whether the user's input is correct or not. Based on that, a different animation is selected and the input buttons have different background colors.
      Parameters:
      isSolved - decides which animation should start

    • animateButtonOnSolved

      private void animateButtonOnSolved​(javafx.scene.control.Button button)
      Animate the input Button
      Parameters:
      button - is animated

    • animateButtonOnNotSolved

      Parameters:
      button - is animated

    • reset

      public void reset()
      Removes user input

    • delete

      private void delete()

    • setCSS

      private void setCSS​(javafx.scene.control.Button button, boolean isSolved)
      Parameters:
      button - input button which will be styled
      isSolved - factor, which decides how input button will be styled (background color will be either red or green)

    • removeCSS

      private void removeCSS​(javafx.scene.control.Button button)
